Compilation of 3 of the best movies Illumination has ever pit out. While this was bought for my brother, I have been a fan of the DM movies since DM came out in 2010.

Despicable Me tells the tale of a supervillain  named Gru with plans to steal the moon. But when he adopts 3 little girls to use them in his latest plan, he unexpectedly finds he has what it takes to be a great dad. In Despicable Me 2, we meet up with Gru, his girls, and his army of loveable minions again. Having left behind a life if villainy to be a father to his girls, Gru is recruited by Lucy Wilde to join the Anti-Villain League and track down a villain who''s plan to rule the world hits rather close to home for Gru. Finally, in Minions, we get to learn the whimsical story behind the Minions and what they were up to before they met Gru. As Kevin, Bob, And Stuatt look for an evil master for their kind to serve, they meet Supervillains Scarlet and Herb Overkill and, after plenty of classic minion misfires, find they must save their kind from annihalation.

If you haven't seen or purchased these yet, be sure to grab them. It''s a perfect set for those who need to catch up before they see DM 3.

So when I first purchased this set, it was for the wrong country. That description had no mention of it being UK, even though the customer reviews did make mention of it.  TLDR: This set was available for a lightning deal ($15) which was too good to pass up.

It is worth mentioning to pay attention to your web browser address bar and/or the ASIN number in the product details.
The UK version is B00YS4V53A; this one (USA) is B01DDEEWSU.
The digital codes wind up in VUDU/MoviesAnywhere or iTunes.

Our child loves the Minions movie so we wanted to get a version that includes the digital copy.  I am a fan of Despicable Me and Despicable Me 2 so the three pack was a bonus.  The digital copy was easy to add to our account and the movie is well packaged.

I purchased these for entertainment during a 2000 mile road trip for the 5 year old. For that they were perfect. When we got to our destination we went to the theater and watched Dispicable Me 3. It was def fun for her.

While she absolutely loved them we noticed that these movies (like PJ masks on Disney Junior) negatively impact her behavior.

I don't know what the deal is with certain shows and movies but my daughter becomes defiant and nasty when she watches certain shows. The Minion movies have that effect. Movies like Trolls and shows like Wild Kratts do not impact her behavior.

We read it can be the frame rate and how certain children react. I have no idea, the movies are definitely a solid 3/3.5.

Over all I'm glad we purchased these for the trip. We no longer watch them. When she's older we'll reintroduce them.

My friend bought this bundle pack for me and I loved it initially! It is a decent price with 3-pack of blue-rays, DVDs, and digital versions. Then I found that the digital copy code was missing for Despicable Me 2 for no reason. I tried to contact customer service to get the code but they said it does not come with codes, which should not be the case. I ended up with not getting the code because they also wanted me to ship the whole package back to get a replacement, but I refused because it would cause me too much work. You may want to check every pack carefully to make sure everything is there, so that it won't create further troubles to other customers.

The movies themselves are great and my low rating is not about them, but about this compilation.  We bought this mostly because it states you're able to download or stream it.  hahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha.  That has been a joke.  It seems that unless you want to do so through iTunes (which isn't going to happen on my Android devices or Xbox) best of luck to you!  It leads you to some other site, the name of which I cannot recall, but it's useless.  You download the app, you go through steps and in the end, you never get to a point where you can actually watch the  movie.  You always need something additional.  I apologize; it's been a few months so I can't remember all of the details.  But we're not luddites.  We get tech stuff, but this was just unusable.  Now we're relegated to actually popping in the DVDs if we want to watch.  When I bought this I thought I was going to be able to avoid that and just have them as a nice backup.  Movies are great though.  Yay Minions!

Looks great, easy to use, everything that was suppose to be there was. Though I haven't yet gotten to try to register the digital copies yet or watch the minions movie or mini movies. But so far so good! We are trying to expand our collection of blurays into more kid friendly movies so this was a great buy for us. We love getting to buy double or triple bluray series like this so we do get the most for our money but then don't have to go through the hassle of "tracking down " all the separate pieces to a collection and can just sit back and enjoy a movie marathon if we so choose.lol And just so you know, you've done an excellent job on keeping the price down because besides 1 other physical location place you've normally always had the best "bang for your buck" so to speak.lol So in conclusion....lol Wonderful product, great for kids of ages, and our personal favorite movies in this collection are the Despicable Me 1 & 2.
